summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman. The original email, sent by Mark L. Epstein on May 24, 2020, contains a cryptic and potentially threatening message ('LOOK behind you. Maybe someone is there right now with his gun') along with a shortened URL. The email appears to be a direct communication to an attorney, suggesting an attempt at intimidation or a warning.

persons.name: Stacey Richman
persons.context: Attorney at the Law Offices of Richman Hill & Associates PLLC who forwarded an email she received from Mark L. Epstein. Her email includes a standard confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Mark L. Epstein
persons.context: Individual who sent the original email to Stacey Richman containing a cryptic and potentially threatening message with a shortened URL (grat.in/uxdyd).

connections.description: Mark L. Epstein sent a direct email to attorney Stacey Richman.

events.title: Cryptic Email Sent to Attorney
events.description: Mark L. Epstein sends an email to attorney Stacey Richman containing the message 'LOOK behind you. Maybe someone is there right now with his gun' and a shortened URL.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein sent a direct email to attorney Stacey Richman on May 24, 2020.
The email's content is a cryptic and potentially threatening message: 'LOOK behind you. Maybe someone is there right now with his gun'.
The email includes a shortened URL (grat.in/uxdyd), the destination of which is unknown from this document.
Stacey Richman is an attorney with the Law Offices of Richman Hill & Associates PLLC in the Bronx, New York.
The communication suggests an attempt to contact or possibly intimidate a legal professional.
